alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 9:44PM CDT until May 09 at 6:05AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas...Missouri... Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post affecting Bates and Linn KS Counties. For the Marais Des Cygnes River...including Osawatomie, La Cygne, Trading Post...Moderate flooding is forecast. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying farmland occurs and water begins to approach Stateline Road north of the river gauge. At 29.0 feet, Stateline Road is flooded north of the river gauge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday afternoon to a crest of 29.9 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
